short_description: Plot a real confusion matrix table
long_description: Plot the output of ConfusionMatrix a real table with fmeasure value.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The input table of ConfusionMatrix function
input_tables.description: The input table of ConfusionMatrix function

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.rDescription: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queen’s IP address or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the database where the input table is located.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.rDescription: The Aster Database password of the user.
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.rDescription: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.rDescription: The password for the SSL truststore.
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: ObsColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input column that contains the observed class.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input column that contains the observed class.

argument_clauses.name: PredictColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input column that contains the predicted class.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input column that contains the predicted class.

argument_clauses.name: OutputTable
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the string with which to start the output table names. (which are output_table_1, output_table_2, and output_table_3).
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the string with which to start the output table names. (which are output_table_1, output_table_2, and output_table_3).

argument_clauses.name: classes
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the classes to output in output_table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the classes to output in output_table.

argument_clauses.name: Prevalence
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the prevalences for the classes to output in output_table_3. Therefore, if you specify prevalence, then you must also specify classes, and for every class, you must specify a prevalence
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the prevalences for the classes to output in output_table_3. Therefore, if you specify Prevalence, then you must also specify Classes, and for every class, you must specify a prevalence.
